singlefamily22.description: Stately Queen Anne three family in prime Everett Street location. Gracious and welcoming first floor residence contains three or four bedrooms with flexibility for various uses. Second floor offers light filled one bedroom unit and a sunny spacious two bedroom apartment. Original touches and details are preserved throughout. Entire property has been updated and well maintained by the current owner. Large parking area for 6 cars plus 3 car garage are approached from Kay Terrace. Beautiful yard, gardens, porches and decks compliment this special and unique residence.

This property is a legal mixed-use commercial 4 unit building. First floor has a one bedroom apartment and a small office or retail space. Second floor is a 3 bed 1.5 bath apartment and the third floor is a 3 bedroom 2 bath, both of which are rented for short term rentals with proven financial history. Excellent downtown location with 4 parking spots, patio area, deck, and a brand-new heating system and roof.  Potential for a roof top deck with harbor views.  Don't miss out on this incredible investment opportunity!

"Jack's House" is a spacious side by side duplex steps from Newport Harbor and it's vibrant downtown. Fully fenced backyard.  11 Brewer comes fully furnished and set up as a short term rental (minimum 30 days), and configured as a 4 bedroom (2 bedrooms have no closets). Grossed $36,000 this summer. Kitchen and bathrooms are updated. 13 Brewer is also configured as a 4 bedroom and has previously been a long term rental.  Each side has it's own entrance, washer and dryer, basement, as well as yard area.  Everything is separate, with the exception of the water.  Newer roof.   An excellent opportunity as an investment, owner occupied or conversion to a large single family.   Property being sold "as is"

Two family located in the heart of the Fifth Ward.  Unit one has two bedrooms and one bathroom, all new carpet, newly painted, brand new stove, washer/dryer and a private patio.  Unit two has three bedrooms and one bathroom, hardwood floors, one AC wall unit, washer/dryer hook-ups, and a new private deck.  The roof is young, brand new water heater and the exterior has been painted within the last year.  One car garage that is heated and three off-street parking spaces.  Utilities are not separate.  Great investment property or owner occupied!

Three family home in excellent Lower Thames/Yachting Village neighborhood, with Public Library, Park and Harborfront at its doorstep. On the first floor you will find a one bedroom apartment with galley kitchen, some original details and direct access to the charming back yard with patio. There is a 2 bedroom apartment on the second floor with a small deck. The most unique apartment is on the top floor with cathedral ceilings, skylight, a large picture window and a deck from which one has peaks the harbor and the water.  Each unit has separate gas and electric utilities as well as their own washers and dryers. Recent improvements include a new roof and a deck on the third floor. Unit 1 and 2 have tenants in place until May 31, 2023. Unit 3 has tenants in place until June 30, 2023. Current rents are below market value. Tenants have assigned parking spaces at 21 Young St. ( see MLS#1319108). This is an estate sale, no disclosure.

Welcome to 26 Anthony St!  This charming two family home has consistent rental history or is a great option for a buyer looking to owner occupy and offset the mortgage with income.  Located in the heart of Newport, between Thames and Bellevue, you're in walking distance to the harbor, shops and restaurants.  Both units have two bedrooms and one bath, have hardwoods, and separate heating systems, plus shared laundry in the basement.  The first floor has a large living room with sliders to the patio/yard area and a wood stove.  The second floor is bright and move-in ready, great for tenants.  Don't miss out on this great opportunity!

ATTENTION ALL RESTAURANT OWNERS AND YACHTING MANAGERS. This property is spacious and has much to offer. Great living space in each unit to include outdoor space as well. Upgrades during the past year include new membrane roofs, new Trex decking system, interior and exterior painting, new shingle and clapboard siding work, many new appliances, showers and tubs. 7 off street parking spaces as well as 1 attached garage. We are interviewing possible renters but it is completely vacant at this time. Customize your own rental model. Separate utilities are already in place. No flood insurance needed. Possible owner financing.

Large three family home in excellent condition has three car garage... 1st floor three  bedroom apartment w/ hardwood floors, open kitchen/ dining areas and small front porch,  spacious 2nd and third floor units each have 2 bedrooms. Both first and second floor  apartments have own private covered porches. Heat and electric are separately metered  and water has one meter for all three units. Units #1 & #2 have newer oil fired FHW Heating  systems that also supply hot water. Unit #3 has newer electric hot water tank. Property  being offered in "as is" condition.

3 family building for sale off Broadway!  Unit 1 encompasses the entire first floor at almost 1600 sqft!  Great kitchen layout with exposed beams, 3 comfortably sized bedrooms, 2 full baths and a bonus room off one of the bedroom leading out to the porch.  Maybe utilize it as an office?  Each unit has a private deck as well shared yard space.  Second floor has 2 units side by side.  The studio unit boasts high ceilings, with an additional living space above with closet.  The one bedroom unit has an additional loft space that currently serves as a second bedroom.  An eat in kitchen leads into a large private deck, perfect for hosting company!  Recent updates include composite decking, a brand new roof/skylights as well as separating out the electric for 3 unit services and painting throughout.  Parking is ABUNDANT on the property, easily fitting AT LEAST 6 cars! a hard to find amenity in Newport at this price point.  Close proximity to Broadway shops and restaurants, this 3 family is a must see!

Amazing opportunity to buy a multi-family in the heart of Newport. This duplex is tucked away on a quiet street between Thames and Bellevue right near the library and within in walking distance to everything Newport has to offer.  The townhouse style units each feature a large living room, dining room and kitchen on the first floor plus a half bath, and three bedrooms and full bath upstairs.  Separate basements and utilities and ductless mini splits.  Each unit has a back patio perfect for a grill and table to enjoy the summer.  Potential for a third floor expansion with potential water views.  Don't miss out on this great opportunity to update this property and maximize your income.

Welcome to 23 Stockholm Street.  Located in the highly desirable Fifth Ward neighborhood, this two unit multi-family property is ideal for an owner-occupant looking to offset their expenses or an investor looking to capitalize on Newport’s seasonal rental schedule.  Each unit was updated in 2010 and a new roof was installed in 2020.  Both units feature an open layout between the kitchen and living room with two bedrooms, a full bathroom, and hardwood floors throughout.  Stockholm Street is located directly off of Thames Street and is a short walk to King Park and Newport Harbor.  A very low-maintenance lot, the back area is completely graveled which allows for plenty of off-street parking (a huge benefit in this area).  This home has been consistently rented for years and is ready for its new owner.

A spacious Victorian duplex on Greenough Place is ready for the next chapter. Conveniently situated on almost a quarter of an acre on one of the best streets in Newport, close to Bellevue Avenue and Newport Harbor sunsets. Each unit is a mirror image of the other offering 4 bedrooms and 4 levels of interior sprawl. Enter to find a Victorian-style open stairwell leading to the second and third floors. Built in 1922, the units have inviting and uniquely open floorplans, where the living areas effortlessly flow into the respective dining rooms and kitchens. This townhouse features an exceptionally large driveway with access to a private & perfectly divided yard. Each unit enjoys their own paved patio, rear back entrance & bulkhead access to the basement, plus a shared shed and rear gardens w/ mature plantings. Recent upgrades include new furnaces, a young roof, siding, and rebuilt front porch. A highly desirable style of home for the area, this duplex offers you an incredible investment opportunity, with a strong rental history. Leases in place until June 2023/Unit A and February 2024/Unit B.

Cozy duplex.

Tenant responsible for water, oil, electric, cable, lawn/yard care

Rare opportunity to own this amazing property that has been in the family for many years.  This grand historical home was once a single family owned by the Champlin family.  It was converted into 5 apartments, 4 of which are one-bedroom units and the other with two bedrooms.  All have original fireplaces which are not in use however make a grand statement in the room.  One unit has a balcony, one with a private enclosed back porch, and one with a private back entrance.  The third-floor unit has 2 full bathrooms and a large family room with separate entrance.  There also is a two-car garage with additional 4 parking spaces in the paved driveway.  The private yard is well landscaped with a mature dogwood tree, hydrangea, and privacy hedges.  This property is located in a quiet neighborhood setting with walkable access to the water.  Ready for the next owners which could use as investment property or convert back to its original grand residential home. PLEASE NOTE THIS IS A 5 UNIT MULTI FAMILY.

Welcome to your future home! This incredible property is conveniently located just a half mile from the scenic Cliff Walk, is LESS THAN ONE MILE from First Beach and exactly one mile from THAMES STREET! This home is a short walk to some of Newport’s most desirable locations and is any buyer’s dream. In this safe and quiet neighborhood, you’re close enough to the fun but far enough away from a slice of peace and tranquility. Truly the best of both worlds! This 3 unit, 7 bedroom, 3.5 bath property sits on a lot size that is double to most of the surrounding lots. It offers premium off-street parking with 6-8 spots, only for residents. PROPERTY IS BEING SOLD AS IS but has incredible potential. The first and second floors need updating and are completely vacant. The third floor was renovated within the last five years and is currently rented. Who doesn’t want to buy a multi-family in Newport? Between the desirable location, the upgrade potential and beautiful neighborhood, this property could be worth millions. If you’re looking for a diamond in the rough, then look no further.

Estimated Payment $5,313 Per Month. * 20% Down 30-Year fixed mortgage rate of 5.27% with an APR of 5.28% for those who qualify. * Taxes insurance not included. * Rates As of 08/03/22.   __________________________________________________________________________________________________________  This unique colonial located in the prestigious Point section of historic and beautiful Newport has been completely remodeled (down to the studs) and is ready for its next owner. Conveniently situated only steps away from everything "America's First Resort" has to offer, this multi boasts a first-floor unit with 2 bedrooms, a 2-level second unit with 4 bedrooms, AND a separate loft cottage. Adorned with shiplap, original woodworking, glass tile, stainless steel appliances, gleaming hardwoods, central air... what more could you want? There are only finishing touches left to complete this project, and the current owner is willing to work with the right buyer to get it there to his/her taste. With an appraisal in hand for $1.3M, this one already has equity built-in, a rare find in this market!

Entered for Comp Purposes Only. Sold in conjuction with the sale of MLS #1287022.  Spacious, sun-filled and completely renovated two-unit historic house. First floor apartment offers elegant living room with high ceilings, hardwoods, granite and stainless kitchen and over-sized primary bedroom with full en-suite bath. In-unit stackable washer/dryer next to a second full bath. Additional second bedroom off the kitchen. The second floor unit offers two levels with primary bedroom and bath, living room and kitchen and laundry on the main level and two additional rooms on the top level. Gas heat, off-street parking for 4 and two common porches. Close to Cliff Walk and Eastons Beach, and downtown.

Located in the heart of Newport, this property can continue to be the great investment property it has been for generations, or it could become a new family compound. Its present use is 3 residential rental units plus 1 commercial space which houses an active cafe and sandwich shop. At the rear of the property is a separate structure with 5 garage bays. There is plenty of parking on the premises as well as adequate off-street parking out front.  Two of the residential units are currently rented - the owners have held off renting the third leaving it for the new owner to decide. Hardwood floors are throughout the building keeping up with the charm of the 1870 built home. Future plans could include an expansion over the garage bays or conversion back to a single-family home. The possibilities for the property are truly endless all while continuing to have great income generating investment potential.

Presently a two-family home that could also work well as a single family home.  Each unit has one bedroom, living room, kitchen and bath.  Second floor needs renovation and tenants are on month-to month leases.    There is gas heat and hot water.  This is a great location, nice street and easy access to practically everything in Newport including Broadway, downtown, and Newport Naval Base . Easy commute location as well with easy access to Newport Bridge.

This beautifully renovated two-family home is rented with month-to-month leases to family members. The rents are currently priced well under market. The home was originally built as a single family and could be converted back. Each unit has its own integral gas heating system, electric, and water meter, and washer/dryer. Second floor unit has Central A/C. There is parking for 3 cars and a spacious backyard. Located a short walk to restaurants, theaters, Newport Harbor, and Newport's Historic Point. A well established and consistent rental history would make this a fabulous investment or owner occupied residence.
Sold before print, listed for comp purposes only.

This multi-family property zoned Limited Business is located right on Thames Street in the Fifth Ward.  Three spacious units with off-street parking make this a prime property to capitalize on lucrative seasonal rentals.  Registration required by the city but the property is zoned for short term rentals.  Each unit is turnkey and desirable to both summer and student renters.  Great opportunity for those looking for an investment!

This renovated two family in the heart of downtown Newport makes a great investment. Both units have been updated with stylish decor, new kitchens and baths, in unit laundry, ductless A/C and other mechanical updates. Other features include bright rooms, tasteful paint colors throughout and hardwood floors. With proven rental history yearly and seasonally, there is great income potential if you choose to rent both units, or live in one unit and rent the other.  Foundation needs repair and included in the disclosure. Structural Engineer quote to be provided upon request.   Rental Info 2022:   Unit 1- Summer $5750/month  Winter- $2400    Unit 2- Summer  $3750/month  Sept 1 to Annual Lease- $2225  Unit 1 is available to immediate move in and vacant for the summer. It is rented for winter 2022-2023.  Unit 2 is fully rented until Sept 2023.
Sold before list, for comp purposes only

2 Goodwin St, Newport, RI 02840 is a multi family home that contains 2,147 sq ft and was built in 1900. It contains 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. This home last sold for $1,550,000 in June 2022. 
 
The Zestimate for this house is $969,800. The Rent Zestimate for this home is $2,063/mo.

Endless possibilities await with this waterfront home inches from the Newport line. Explosive sunrises await you along with moon filled nights reflecting off the water.   So many options- Turn this beautiful property into a single-family home or rent one side and keep the other as a weekend retreat, use one side as an office and the other as your home, most importantly live close to the ocean and relish its beauty. The property is within walking distance to the beach and downtown.  Unit 1 is complete; Unit 2 is under construction and will be finished with in 30 days.   Easy to show.

Charming, well maintained two-family home in the heart of Newport!  11 Chapel offers endless income potential with three floors of rentable space, plus a detached garage. The sun-filled first floor features two bedrooms, one bathroom, and recently updated kitchen. Ascend the gracious staircase to the second floor, where you’ll find one bedroom, and spacious living quarters. Additional bedrooms, newly-added closet, and code-compliant windows on bonus third floor. There is an oversized garage  and rare  2 car parking which is accessed on Tews Court.  Enjoy the private backyard space, or comfort of the front porch. Walk to famed Bellevue Avenue, downtown, and beach!

A 3-family apartment house in quiet area of the Historic Point. Many exterior works have been done.  The present tenants have resided at this unit for several years. This is the first time this property has been marketed for sale.

Volvo Racing - Location/Location/Location
  Just a few steps from this luxury home is the water shuttle to Fort Adams. This is the best and quickest way to enjoy the Volvo event and have easy access to "home". 3beds, 2.5 baths and THE SPOT!

40-42 Webster St, Newport, RI 02840 is a multi family home that contains 2,720 sq ft and was built in 1900. It contains 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. This home last sold for $800,000 in May 2022. 
 
The Zestimate for this house is $1,032,700. The Rent Zestimate for this home is $3,090/mo.

41-43 Rhode Island Ave, Newport, RI 02840 is a multi family home that contains 3,140 sq ft and was built in 1892. It contains 7 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms. This home last sold for $1,050,000 in May 2022. 
 
The Zestimate for this house is $1,149,600. The Rent Zestimate for this home is $3,627/mo.

Well kept owner occupied two family with strong rental history.  Unit 1 has three bedrooms with an updated kitchen.  Unit 2 has 4-5 bedrooms and 2 full baths; unit 2 occupies two of the three floors.  This two family home has ample off-street parking and is within walking distance to town.  Great investment opportunity, summer / winter or year round.  or live in one unit and rent the other.

Welcome to 145-147 Gibbs Avenue.  Whether you’re an owner occupant or investor, this is a home you won’t want to miss!  Renovated down to the studs in 2018, this beautiful 2-family is completely turn key and a "crown jewel" amongst multi-family homes in Newport.  Unit 1 is a first floor 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment.  Unit 2 is a townhouse style second and third floor apartment with 4 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms as well as a bonus office space.  Updates include newly renovated kitchens with granite countertops, stainless appliances (including a dishwasher in both units), center island with deep basin sink, white shaker cabinets and an open, inviting layout that’s perfect for entertaining.  All separate utilities including water, new high efficiency Navien gas heating systems, separate laundry for each apartment, hardwood floors throughout each unit, and updated bathrooms with tiled surrounds and modern vanities.  New vinyl windows and cedar shingle siding in 2018.  A French drain and sump pump were installed as well to keep the basement bone dry.  The large driveway allows for 3 tandem parking spaces and a fully fenced backyard is perfect for your outdoor enjoyment.  Located on the Kay Street side of Gibbs Avenue, this neighborhood has a quiet residential feel and is close to the beaches, Braga Park, Broadway, Bellevue and all that Newport has to offer.

Updated 2 family home in Newport! Steps away from Broadway’s Restaurants and shops! Ample parking with access to driveway from Warner Street and Newport Ave. Beautiful patio in the courtyard with a garage! Large front porch offers separate entrances to each units with plenty of room for outdoor furniture. Unit 1 is a spacious 1st floor bedroom, 1 bath unit with high ceilings, large windows with lots of light, and hardwood flooring though out. Generous living room and dining room with a decorative fireplace; both off the updated kitchen. Bonus room perfect for an office, or guest accommodations. Unit 2 is townhouse style unit with living on the 2nd & 3rd floor. The eat in kitchen features beautiful granite countertops and stainless-steel appliances. Beautiful hardwood floors and large windows throughout this floor as well. The dining room is complemented by glass French doors and has a large west facing window for afternoon and evening light. A large closet in this room is ideal storing bulkier items. The living room has a beautiful ornamental fireplace with access to a small bonus room that leads out to your private second story covered porch! Full bath on this level with ceramic floor tiles, subway tiled walls and a full tub/shower combination. Upstairs is an additional full bath with shower stall. 3 bedrooms share a generously sized landing. Basement has washer/dryer hook ups for each unit. Efficient gas heating. Separate utilities! And new roof!

Boasting the name "The Hazard House 1888" this unique home is rich with historic charm and is outfitted with thoughtful architectural detailing. Situated on a small, dead-end road tucked just off of Thames St, this home can make a beautiful primary residence or a tranquil getaway as an investment property. Zoned as a 2-family, it was most recently occupied by two renters, but it could easily function as a single-family, primary residence with an in-law garden apartment, guest quarters, or more (see listing #1302521).  Each unit has a private entrance. The main house offers generous living space with formal living room, kitchen, dining room, full bathroom, and den on the first floor. The second floor has an oversized master bedroom with a sweet Juliet balcony, two additional bedrooms, and full bathroom with laundry.  Large attic space also offers expansive opportunities.  The garden apartment has an additional two bedrooms, full bathroom, kitchen and living room.  A private pavered yard blooms with mature foliage and has a pergola for added privacy and comfort. Centrally located in the Historic Point, you can enjoy baseball games at Cardines field, walk to the Newport Shipyard and waterfront, enjoy downtown Thames St dining and shopping, and easily access the Pell Bridge for getting on and off Aquidneck Island. Experience all that Newport has to offer at this central location.

Enjoy the Fabulous UNOBSTRUCTED  Water Views & Sunsets on Narragansett Bay overlooking Newport’s Iconic Claiborne Pell Bridge!! This rare two family residence was completely renovated from bottom up in 2005. Each unit offers a master suite with private bath, an additional bedroom and bath, a private laundry room with washer & dryer, gas fireplaces in the living rooms, and completely separate utilities.  The Owner’s unit has gleaming hardwood floors from the kitchen to the dining room and living room. The large french doors open to a wraparound deck & porch where you can enjoy the ocean breeze and the views of the Bay.  Other features include central air, a large cedar closet and a sauna in the lower level , multiple decks, off street parking for four vehicles, and a private mooring is available.  In addition to the property’s current use, this property is a great opportunity for a multi-generational family residence, an in law situation or could be easily converted into to a single family residence.  Being located north of the Newport Bridge allows you easy access off the Island, minutes to the Naval War College, the Pier, Battery Park, Goat Island, and downtown Newport.   This is a Special Newport Waterfront Home!!

$1500/mo, utilities included
Central, walk-able Newport location! Our in-law style apartment is located in a lovely residential neighborhood and has a private back entrance.  It s a scenic, one mile walk to the beach or downtown, and our tenants are also welcome to share access to our yard and grill. The apartment is a larger studio, is very efficient and well-equipped.  The kitchen is furnished (coffee maker, toaster oven, stove, hot plate, fridge, dishwasher and microwave).  Other amenities include high quality, queen-sized mattress and bed, nightstands, bureau, leather couches, high speed wifi, cable, stack-able washer and dryer, access to grill and plenty of on-street parking.  We live on-property with a friendly 10-year old border collie mix named Finn.  We all hope to welcome you to Newport!

This charming second floor duplex apartment has a private entrance and a fabulous open floor plan with cathedral ceilings. It features well preserved original wood floors and comfortable furnishings. There is a washer dryer in the apartment. Assigned parking. You can walk to every attraction that down town Newport has to offer. This apartment is available year round or for the winter term at the price listed. Small pet considered.

Investment opportunity with this classic mansard in the Downtown area.  Handsome legal three family with lots of potential.  Each unit offers two bedrooms, over 1100sf, and separate utilities.  Other features include off-street parking, generator and large fenced yard in the rear.  Property in need of updating and being sold as-is.

Victorian Two Family Home in a Great Newport Location near the Hospital and Trendy Broadway. Two Spacious and Bright Apartments each with 2 bedrooms & one bath. Both apartments include living room, dining room and good size eat in kitchen. High ceilings, period detail and hardwood floors throughout that were recently sanded.  The entry has a covered porch and small enclosed common sitting area. Front door leads to large common Foyer and beautiful curved stairway to the 2nd floor apartment. Easy maintenance with vinyl siding and replacement windows. Very efficient to run with a two new high efficiency gas heating systems.  All separate utilities including separate laundry set ups. This is a perfect owner occupied property or a great investment opportunity. The unfinished third floor could be finished to add 2 more bedrooms and a bath for more living space for the 2nd floor apartment. Tenants in place. Second floor vacant on 3-1-2022.  Two off street parking. Fenced yard. Easy on and off the Island. Close to the Naval Base. Walk to the Broadway shops and restaurants.

51-55 Powel Ave, Newport, RI 02840 is a multi family home that contains 2,962 sq ft and was built in 1929. It contains 6 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. This home last sold for $510,000 in April 2022. 
 
The Zestimate for this house is $539,800. The Rent Zestimate for this home is $1,741/mo.

Investors take note… Legal 4 unit property located in the Fifth Ward.  This property has two separate buildings on one lot.   The building closest to the street is the rental property.  The second building lends itself to being a great owner-occupied property….Live for free, or rent it out for positive cash flow.   The front building is the original 1920’s home that has been converted into three units, 2 - 1 BD/1 BA and 1 -2BD/1 BA.  The property has an excellent rental history…all three units currently have leases in place (the sale is contingent on all leases being honored).  In the back is the detached garage that has been converted into a very spacious 4BD owner’s unit boasting two full baths with custom marble showers and a great open living room.      The property has been well maintained through the years.  The newer roof has 30-year architectural shingles.  The vinyl siding is great for easy exterior maintenance.  The new PVC fence surrounding the entire property gives you privacy all year round.  Tons of off-street parking, which is always in demand in Newport.  Partial water views, the home sits directly across the street from Spencer Park, and adjacent to the property is Kings Park which is right on the water.  Don’t forget the proximity to downtown Newport, local beaches, and the many parks and recreational opportunities in the area.  Seller wants to sell the entire property turnkey.

A 3 family investment property located in the desirable 5th Ward neighborhood of Newport! Large yard with ample off-street parking for 3 cars. There are three 1-bedroom units with separate utilities for electric & gas and a long rental history. Just steps from downtown and the water, this is a great opportunity for both investors and homeowners. Property management in place for a turnkey investment. Pictures are not yet available for unit # 1 but is the same layout as # 2.

9 Harrison Ave, Newport, RI 02840 is a multi family home that contains 2,096 sq ft and was built in 1910. It contains 4 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms. This home last sold for $800,000 in March 2022. 
 
The Zestimate for this house is $1,005,200. The Rent Zestimate for this home is $2,762/mo.

21-23 Pell St, Newport, RI 02840 is a multi family home that contains 3,102 sq ft and was built in 1919. It contains 6 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms. This home last sold for $850,000 in March 2022. 
 
The Zestimate for this house is $902,000. The Rent Zestimate for this home is $3,694/mo.
Sold before Print. Listed for Comp purposes only.

PRISTINE 2-Family home in prime location near the Navy Base and close to Broadway and Downtown Newport. Special Features include a newly renovated first floor unit that is currently vacant and ready to rent or perhaps owner occupy. Second/Third Floor is an updated townhouse style unit that is currently rented with 4 bedrooms, living room and eat-in kitchen. 2 parking spaces, replacement windows, back patio, separate utilities and newer heating systems to name a few highlights. This is a great investment that is literally a turn key opportunity. Don't miss it!

Two family in desirable location off Rhode Island Ave.  Walk to lower Broadway restaurants and downtown shopping.  One bedroom first floor unit with new flooring, pocket doors, spacious kitchen, living room and dining room. Large 3-4 bedrooms on second floor unit with dining room, eat in kitchen, living room and access to spacious third floor rooms. Brand new state of the art gas furnaces. New roof, updated electric.  Vinyl siding for easy maintenance.  This property is being sold "as is".

Beautiful Home in Newport!
Beautiful house with great space and features in gorgeous condition. Finished basement, yard!

Sold prior to print. Entered for comparable purposes only.   Impressive 3 family sitting just above lower Broadway offers stunning curb appeal with classic victorian Queen Anne features.   This gorgeous home has slightly over 4,600 square feet of living space divided between 3 spacious units that are equipped with many original details throughout merged with modern conveniences, such as a washer/dryer in each unit, 3 gas meters, replacement windows, separate electrical, and 2 water meters.   This is a rare income-producing property with impressive architectural features that deserve to be admired and preserved.

Entered for Comp purposes only.   Original house (Jeremiah Lawton House) built 1740 and added onto over the years.   Presently, main house is side by side duplex with side add on (#56) used as commercial uses over the years.   Wonderful example of a Newport Colonial  with all the expected selling points (i.e. wide plank floors, large open cooking fireplace, dentil moldings, etc). Located in GB zone and in short walking distance to downtown Newport.

50 Hammond St, Newport, RI 02840 is a multi family home that contains 3,306 sq ft and was built in 1890. It contains 6 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. This home last sold for $625,000 in February 2022. 
 
The Zestimate for this house is $1,027,200. The Rent Zestimate for this home is $2,966/mo.

A great opportunity to own a corner of Newport's Historic Hill.  This mixed use building on the corner of Church St and Spring St has many possibilities!  An owner occupied building with the commercial space paying your mortgage or an investment property with the possibility of both short and long term rentals while also keeping an attic apartment for yourself to use.  Also, property has a fenced in private side yard with garden, patio and BBQ plus driveway that fits 5 vehicles.  Walk to everything and park in your own driveway!

35 Elm St, Newport, RI 02840 is a multi family home that contains 2,257 sq ft and was built in 1887. It contains 6 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. This home last sold for $610,000 in January 2022. 
 
The Zestimate for this house is $1,032,900. The Rent Zestimate for this home is $3,087/mo.

Solid two-family tucked into the Point neighborhood of downtown Newport, just steps from upper Thames Street and Washington Square. This low-maintenance investment property has seen many upgrades over the last 20 years and offers all separate utilities with young boilers, new exterior siding, parking and no lawn to mow. Two spacious units feature separate entrances, double-parlor living spaces, large eat-in kitchens and shared basement laundry. The first floor provides a single-level 2-bed/1-bath with interior access to the basement. The second unit spans over two levels, including 4-bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. Once operating as a 3-family, the cozy third floor has its own heating zone, full bathroom, plus sitting room with wet bar and Vermont Castings gas stove. Keep long-term tenants for a hassle-free investment or maximize income by shifting to seasonal rentals in 2022.

Centrally located in Newport!  Located in a beautiful neighborhood lined with stunning colonial homes, this spacious two family is within walking distance to downtown, the harbor and eclectic Broadway.  3 bedrooms in each unit with a fenced in yard.  Needs a little TLC and the rents are well under market.  Invest in Newport!!!

Great 2 family side-by-side apartments.  Each unit has 3 bedrooms, dining room, hardwood floors and full basement.  They each have a separate entrance and rear doors.  All utilities are paid by tenants.  Each unit has new oil furnaces etc. Tenants have been there for several years.

See MLS# 1289801/1289800. Withdrawn for repairs then sold off-market.   Incredible opportunity to have spacious living on a quiet street in desirable Historic Hill. A product of the gilded-age, this stately Italianate Victorian offers over 3,500 sq. ft of living space, encompassing a 4-bedroom owner’s unit plus an income-producing 2-bedroom apartment on the third floor. Enjoy the privacy and amenities of a single family home including exclusive front entrance, fenced yard, and cobblestone driveway for two. The primary unit welcomes you with a grand entryway garnished with high ceilings, elaborate moldings and an impressive staircase. "The Telephone Building" is an historic building in downtown Newport constructed in the late 19th century in Beaux-Arts style. This iconic, one-of-a-kind property was designed by Boston architects Perkins & Betton, the team behind the famed King Block on Newport's storied Bellevue Avenue. The building's brick and limestone façade features dentil molding and a grand Palladian window. The property was sensitively restored and converted into a residential building consisting of a spectacular loft-style owner's unit and various income opportunities, thanks to its location in the General Business zone. The owner's unit is contemporary in feel, yet retains historic elements, abounding in repurposed materials, exposed brick, oversized windows, and artisanal encaustic cement tile inserts. A floating staircase leads from the loft to an intimate rooftop salon that opens to a dramatic deck and green-roof garden overlooking Trinity Church, downtown Newport, and the Newport Bridge and Harbor. This unit lends itself to a live/work lifestyle with a first floor space that is ideal for an at-home office or gym. Just above the three-bedroom, 2.5 bathroom owner's space is a separate and stylish one-bedroom space with roof deck access--perfect for extended family or Airbnb income. Finally, there is a two-bedroom first floor apartment with a cool mix of hardwood and polished concrete floors and its own Zen garden nestled in the back of the property, creating an urban oasis.
